title: League Client -  Bad Image
body:
Every time I start the League Client, an error occurs stating that it has a "bad image". This problem has happened a few times this week, and I was only able to fix it by uninstalling and reinstalling. I am very tired of having this be the only solution, so any alternatives would be useful. Thanks for the help.

The error reads "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcurl.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the origian installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc0000020."

replies.body:
You might be having a permissions issue that's preventing your game files from installing properly.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is being added as an exception.  

Once complete, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help clean out any bad files and perform a clean reinstall.
Thanks for your help. I reinstalled the client, and now whenever I have begin to launch the "new" client, it crashes and shows the same error stated above.

If you are still having the issue. Try deleting the "Riot Games" folder from your "Local Disk" on your computer. 

I moved the folder into the recycle bin and deleted it then redownloaded the game again and it worked
